title: Someone let me know what these tattoo fonts are?? Please.♥
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100310213933im_/http:/typophile.com/files/megan-fox-side-tattoo_5922.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100310213933im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lindsay-lohan-02_3690.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100310213933im_/http:/typophile.com/files/megan-fox-02_5874.jpg)

Really love these tattoos. Need to know the font. Someone let me know. Thanks. ♥
author: KHostetter

comments.content: Please let me know what this font is for these tattoos. Thanks!! ♥

Top sample could be something like Linotext.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/linotext/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100310213933/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/linotext/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/linotext/")

The top typeface looks like Textura, which is for sale as English Textura as part of this (nice) collection:

[http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_styles.php?itemID=200039&variantTyp...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100310213933/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?itemID=200039&variantTypeID=&cpuCount=&productLineID=100012 "http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_styles.php?itemID=200039&variantTypeID=&cpuCount=&productLineID=100012")
The lowercase for the bottom tattoo is Music Hall Text, digitized by David Nalle as [Rheingold](http://web.archive.org/web/20100310213933/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/rheingold/).
